i work at a local party store.

participant_2.background:
I'm not always the nicest person because I feel like I'm always being overlooked by my older siblings.
i like to write poetry.
i can read in english and french.
I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I like to write poetry, play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding, and I'm learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business
That's really cool! I love writing poetry too. I'm not always the nicest person because I feel like I'm always being overlooked by my older siblings
I'm sorry to hear that! I'm sure you're a very nice person. What kind of things do you like to write about?
I like to write about my pets and my experiences riding my bike in the countryside with my dad.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very outdoorsy myself, but I can appreciate the beauty of nature.
I love being outside! I'm always looking for new places to explore.
That's great! I'm sure you've seen some amazing things.
I have! I've seen some of the most beautiful places in the world.
I'm sure you've taken some amazing pictures too!
I have! I love sharing them with my friends and family.
That's great! I'm sure they love seeing them.
Thanks! I'm glad you're enjoying the conversation.
Me too! I'm always happy to meet new people and learn about their lives.
Me too! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
